text: Approval for the Abbott RealTime IDH2.  The device is an in vitro polymerase chain reaction (PCR) assay for the qualitative detection of single nucleotide variants (SNVs) coding nine IDH2 mutations (R140Q, R140L, R140G, R140W, R172K, R172M, R172G, R172S, and R172W) in DNA extracted from blood (EDTA) or human bone marrow (EDTA). Abbott RealTime IDH2 is for use with the Abbott m2000rt System. Abbott RealTime IDH2 is indicated as an aid in identifying acute myeloid leukemia (AML) patients with an isocitrate dehydrogenase-2 (IDH2) mutation for treatment with IDHIFA (enasidenib).
